revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: " (Column 44):;Neilos, son of Euhemeros, grandson of Neilos, mother Sambous, drachmas 8;;Nekpheraus, son of Euhemeros, grandson of Nekpheraus, mother Taonnophris, drachmas 8;;Kastor alias Ptolemaios, son of Ptolemaios,grandson of Kastor, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas8;;Tamaron, daughter of Ischyrion through the agency of Dionysarion (daughter of Antoninus Banas);;orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachmas 5, tax on the produce of olives obols 4 chalki 2, naubion obols 3, surcharges drachma 1 obol 1.5;;(in left margin: drachmas 24 obols 10)eparourion drachmas 3 obols 2, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1 chalki 2, in total drachmas 11, obol 1.5 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 12 obols 3, surcharges obols 4.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 13 obol 1.5 chalki 2;;Damas, son of Petheus (Maximus, son of Pikros);;(in left margin: drachmas 8 obols 2) orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachma 1 obols 2.5, tax on the produce of olives obol 1.5, naubion obol 1, surcharges obols 2.5;;eparourion drachma 1 obol 1, surcharges obol 0.5 chalki 2, kollybos obol 0.5, in total drachmas 3 obols 3.5 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 3 obols 3 chalki 2, surcharges obol 1.5, in total drachmas 3 obols 4.5 chalki 2;;Herieus the younger, son of Horos, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Marcus Vettis Longus (Vettis, son of Petes);;(in left margin: drachmas 24 obols 4) orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachmas 5, naubion obols 3, surcharges drachma 1 obol 0.5 chalki 2;\;eparourion drachmas 3 obols 2, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1 chalki 2, in total drachmas 10 obols 2.5 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 12 obols 3, surcharges obols 4.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 13 obol 1.5 chalki 2;;Ptolemaios, son of Kastor, grandson of Heraklas, mother Taseus, drachmas 20;;Heraklas, his son, mother Ammonous, drachmas 20;;Polis, son of Petheus, grandson of Keras, mother Herais, drachmas 4;;Tanephremis, son of Eirenaios (Abon);;(in left margin: drachmas 12 obols 9) orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachmas 2 obols 3, tax on the produce of olives obols 2 chalki 2, naubion obol 1.5, surchargesobol 3.5 chalki 2;;eparourion drachma 1 obols 4, surcharges obol 1, kollybos obol 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 5 obol 4 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 6 obol 1.5, surcharges obol 2.5, in total drachmas 6 obols 4;;Herieus the older, son of Horos, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Ninis, son of Asklas, grandson of Ninis, mother Tabous, drachmas 4;;Gaius Julius Priscus (Thankiotis);;(in left margin: drachmas 32 obols 17) orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 5 obols 3.5 chalki 2, tax on the produce of olives obols 4.5 chalki 2, naubion drachmas 3.5, surcharges drachma 1 obols 2.5;;eparourion drachmas 3 obols 4.5, surcharges obols 2, kollybos obol 1 chalki 2, in total drachmas 12 obols 4 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 14 obol 0.5, surcharges obols 5.5, in total drachmas 15;;naubion of the katoikoi for the 13th year drachmas 3 obols 4.5, surcharges obols 2 chalki 2;;tax on plots in release likewise drachma 1, surcharges obol 1 chalki 2, kollybos, in total drachma 1 obol 1.5;;in total for the day drachmas 420 obols 16 of which for Sarap() drachmas 16 obols 4.;[space for six lines blank];46 obols 13."
